queries.query: delete from DependenteIsentoEntity dependenteIsento where dependenteIsento.dependente.id in ( select dependenteRoot.id from DependenteEntity dependenteRoot join dependenteRoot.titular titular join titular.empresa empresa where dependenteRoot.id = dependenteIsento.dependente.id and empresa.id = :empresaId ) and dependenteIsento.mes = :mes and dependenteIsento.ano = :ano
